Entry.name: B
Entry.value: Signed signature authorization form or forms for both HCFA-1500 Claim Form block 12 and block 13 are on file

Entry.name: C
Entry.value: Signed HCFA-1500 Claim Form on file

Entry.name: M
Entry.value: Signed signature authorization form for HCFA-1500 Claim Form block 13 on file

Entry.name: P
Entry.value: Signature generated by provider because the patient was not physically present for services

Entry.name: S
Entry.value: Signed signature authorization form for HCFA-1500 Claim Form block 12 on file
